nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir/
shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nam mkha'
la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra

ltar/ nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang

brjod du med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan

yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su
dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad
'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgas pas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 'gyur

ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bde ba mi spongs pas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad bzhin du lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas

gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang / tshes brgyad dang /

bcu bzhi dang / bcwa lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rigs
kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba/ tshad ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma
mchis pa/ rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang bcwa lnga dag

la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel te/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang po dang / tshad med pa grangs med pa/

bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa gzhal du med pa dpag tu med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o/ /rab 'byor
de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni 'di yin te/ sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi dang lha dbul po las
yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/ /rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi
'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /'du shes med 'du shes med myin skye mched kyi bar gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ lan gcig

phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'byin pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul

dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang /

dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che ba dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi
lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / chung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min

skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub yod do/ /bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yod na/ bsam gtan bzhi yod do/ /tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do/ /byang chub kyi

phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan

gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon
par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /

byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las

chos de thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de la bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal

chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang /

snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang chung dge dang tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang che ba dang / chung che dang tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang mi gdung

ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / chung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med

'du shes med myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /

byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /de bas na de ni pha rol du phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o/ /pha rol du phyin pa rin po che
de la ni chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ dor ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba 'am/ 'gag
pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do/ /rab 'byor pha rol du phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/
'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med

de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs nges kyang pha rol du phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor pha rol du phyin pa rin po che la ni gang gis kyang 'go ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor de'i phyir na pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'go ba med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rin po che'o/ /rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed la/ de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'gro bar yang mi byed na/ shes
rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa'o/ /de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
mngon par bsams shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing
nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
'gro'o/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston pa 'am/ rnam par ston pa 'am/ yongs su ston pa 'am/ 'dzin par byed pa 'am/ 'byin par byed pa 'am/
skye bar byed pa 'am/ 'gag par byed pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa 'am/ 'grib par byed pa 'am/ 'phel bar byed pa 'am/ 'das

pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung bar byed pa med do/ /rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi
khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
du phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis
gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa
rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa
ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rang byang chub sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin no// //ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tu na te/ Sha na ta thA ga /to h+ya ba da ta/ te Shany+tsa yo ni ro d+ha/ e ba~M` bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH
zhus so// //dge'o// //bkra shis par gyur gcig /
